definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Amoxicillin is good for your health.
sentences.chinese: 阿莫西林對你的健康很有幫助。

sentences.english: Conclusions Manufacture process of amoxicillin granules is good, stable and under control.
sentences.chinese: 結論該阿莫西林顆粒製劑工藝較好，且水平穩定可控。

sentences.english: Carbamazepine and amoxicillin can also eat it?
sentences.chinese: 卡馬西平和阿莫西林能同時喫麼？

sentences.english: Objective To improve the synthetic technology of amoxicillin.
sentences.chinese: 目的阿莫西林合成工藝的改進。

sentences.english: Jack: Do you even know what Amoxicillin is?
sentences.chinese: 你真的知道阿莫西林是什麼嘛？

sentences.english: The control group(34 cases) was given amoxicillin capsules and compound liquorice tablets.
sentences.chinese: 對照組34例，口服阿莫西林膠囊和複方甘草片治療。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop a method for the determination of high molecular weight impurities in Amoxicillin.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定阿莫西林中高分子雜質的方法。

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed a course of amoxicillin.
sentences.chinese: 醫生給我開了一個療程的阿莫西林。

sentences.english: For example amoxicillin, streptomycin and erythromycin.
sentences.chinese: 例如阿莫西林，鏈黴素，紅黴素。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To compare the quality of several amoxicillin capsules in the market.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察幾種市售阿莫西林膠囊劑的質量。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The plasma glimepiride concentrations were decreased after in combination with amoxicillin.
sentences.chinese: 結論阿莫西林可引起格列美脲的血藥濃度降低。

sentences.english: AIM To establish a method for the determination of ambroxol in ambroxol amoxicillin tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立氨溴索阿莫西林片中氨溴索的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: The average recoveries of antibiotics from milk were over 70% except amoxicillin.
sentences.chinese: 除了阿莫西林外，回收率均大於70%。

sentences.english: I want to buy Amoxycillin granules and Bufferin drops.
sentences.chinese: 我要買阿莫西林顆粒和百服寧滴劑。

definition: antipyretic tablet (to reduce fever), such as sulfanilamide
